parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set amount of ammo resources in cargo space of a rearm vehicle. Ammo resource is used to resupply vehicles that take ammo. Soldiers use individual magazines instead. Amount: 1 is full cargo.

The <u>actual</u> '''quantity''' to work with is determined by the model's class in [[CfgVehicles]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName '''setAmmoCargo''' ammoCargo

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> ammoCargo: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _ammoTruck1 [[setAmmoCargo]] 0.5; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getAmmoCargo]], [[setFuelCargo]], [[setRepairCargo]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 31 Aug, 2011</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:PlacidBox|PlacidBox]]<dd class="note">
While the amount of total 'ammo' that can be reloaded is defined in the truck/supply point's CfgVehicles entry, the amount each round of ammunition takes from that total is defined in the [[CfgAmmo_Config_Reference#cost|CfgAmmo]] 'Cost' entry for that round.

Your typical truck has 300000 ammo capacity, and the tunguska's missiles have a Cost of 50000. So the tunguska can reload a total of 6 missiles from the ammo truck before the ammo capacity is depleted and needs to be set with setAmmoCargo.

A similar thing applies with a vehicle's cfgVehicle Cost entry for repairing, and the vehicle's fuelCapacity entry when refuelling.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 10, 2015 - 19:27 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Waffle SS.|Waffle SS.]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
(Arma 3 1.44) '''setAmmoCargo''' will have no effect if the vehicle doesn't support [[getAmmoCargo]].
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
